transArray.content: The breakfast at the hotel is delicious, and the buffet style is very delicious. When checking in and checking out, the front desk is very professional, and it really takes 30 seconds to check in, which is great

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and sharing your stay experience with us. Our hotel is located on the West Fourth Ring Road, Wuluju Station of Metro Line 6, with convenient transportation. I'm glad to know from your review that this hotel left a good impression on you. Before guests check in, we will conduct ward rounds, clean the rooms and change the sheets before disinfecting and cleaning. There are standardized service procedures at every step. Please feel free to check in. . Breakfast has now returned to buffet style, and the menu items are updated from time to time to provide you with taste buds and nutritional enjoyment. Thank you for your recognition of us. We will continue to do a good job in all aspects. I believe you will have a better stay experience next time you stay. The hotel looks forward to your visit again and wishes you a happy life!
